mapper.select: SELECT DECODE(project1.CUSTOMER_ID, 0, 'N', 'Y') AS CUST_EXIST_Y_N, project1.CUST_ADDR_ID, project1.CUSTOMER_ID, project1.CUST_NAME, project1.NRIC_COMPANY_NO, project1.CUST_BIRTH_DAY, project1.CUST_GENDER, project1.TYPE_ID, project1.CUSTOMER_TYPE, project1.AREA_ID, project1.ADDR_DTL, project1.ADDR, project1.STREET, project1.AREA, project1.POST_CODE, project1.CITY, project1.STATE, project1.COUNTRY, project1.MAIN_YN, project1.STUS_CODE_ID FROM ( SELECT Extent1.CUST_ADD_ID CUST_ADDR_ID , Extent1.CUST_ID CUSTOMER_ID , Extent2.NAME CUST_NAME, Extent2.NRIC NRIC_COMPANY_NO, TO_CHAR(Extent2.DOB, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CUST_BIRTH_DAY, DECODE(Extent2.GENDER, 'M', 'Male', 'F', 'Female') CUST_GENDER, Extent2.TYPE_ID, Extent6.CODE_NAME CUSTOMER_TYPE, Extent1.AREA_ID, Extent1.ADDR_DTL, CASE WHEN ( Extent1.ADDR_DTL IS NOT NULL ) THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(Extent1.ADDR_DTL)) ELSE '' END ||' '|| NVL(Extent1.STREET, '') ||' '|| Extent5.AREA ||' '|| Extent5.POSTCODE ||' '|| Extent5.CITY ||' '|| Extent5.STATE ||' '|| Extent5.COUNTRY AS ADDR, Extent1.STREET, Extent5.AREA, Extent5.POSTCODE as POST_CODE, Extent5.CITY, Extent5.STATE, Extent5.COUNTRY, DECODE(Extent1.STUS_CODE_ID, '9', 'Y','N') as MAIN_YN, CASE WHEN ( Extent1.STUS_CODE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.STUS_CODE_ID ELSE 0 END STUS_CODE_ID FROM SAL0023D Extent1 JOIN SAL0029D Extent2 ON Extent2.CUST_ID = Extent1.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent3 ON Extent3.USER_ID = Extent1.CRT_USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent4 ON Extent4.USER_ID = Extent1.UPD_USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0064M Extent5 ON Extent5.AREA_ID = Extent1.AREA_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M Extent6 ON Extent6.CODE_ID = Extent2.TYPE_ID WHERE 8 <> Extent1.STUS_CODE_ID AND Extent2.TYPE_ID = #{customerType} AND Extent2.NRIC = #{nricCompanyNo} Union All SELECT 0 AS CUST_ADDR_ID , 0 AS CUSTOMER_ID , '' AS CUST_NAME, '' AS NRIC_COMPANY_NO, '' AS CUST_BIRTH_DAY, '' AS CUST_GENDER, 0 AS TYPE_ID, '' AS CUSTOMER_TYPE, '' AS AREA_ID, '' AS ADDR_DTL, '' AS ADDR, '' AS STREET, '' AS AREA, '' AS POST_CODE, '' AS CITY, '' AS STATE, '' AS COUNTRY, '' AS MAIN_YN, 0 AS STUS_CODE_ID FROM DUAL ) project1 WHERE ROWNUM =1 ORDER BY project1.STUS_CODE_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAL0029D (CUST_ID, NAME, NRIC, NATION, DOB, GENDER, RACE_ID, EMAIL, REM, STUS_CODE_ID, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT, REN_GRP, PST_TERMS, ID_OLD, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, TYPE_ID, PAS_SPORT_EXPR, VISA_EXPR, CUST_VA_NO, CORP_TYPE_ID, GST_RGIST_NO) VALUES (#{custIdSeq}, #{custName}, #{nricCompanyNo}, #{cmbNation}, TO_DATE(#{custBirthDay}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), #{custGender}, #{custRace}, #{email}, #{rem}, #{stusCodeId}, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{renGrp}, #{pstTerms}, #{idOld}, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{customerType}, TO_DATE('01/01/1900', 'DD/MM/YYYY'), TO_DATE('01/01/1900', 'DD/MM/YYYY'), NULL, #{cmbCorpTypeId}, #{gstRgistNo})
